game.name: OVERCAT
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Adjustable Difficulty, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: OVERCAT is a 1v1 twin-stick fighting game, where competitive and casual players can finally have a fair fight!
game.shortDescriptionEn: OVERCAT is a 1v1 twin-stick fighting game, where competitive and casual players can finally have a fair fight!
